'''Rigorous Schedule''' is a quest item obtained during [[Ningguang]]'s [[Hangout Events|Hangout Event]], in the quest [[Scheduling the Day]].

==Text==
1. Eat, wash up, change, get ready to go out.<br />
2. Meet businesswoman Luo Qiao at Liuli Pavilion, eat lunch.<br />
3. Meet three informants and exchange information.<br />
4. Go to Yuehai Pavilion for a conference.<br />
5. Light meal, negotiate any outstanding matters from the conference, return to Jade Chamber.

The specific times for the first three items are flexible and progress-dependent. The conference in Item 4 is scheduled for the evening. Arriving early is recommended.
